article:
Many parents want their children to be famous.But do children have the same _ ?
A new _ Hi,Ke'ai(<<,>> )is on at Beijing Children's Art Theatre.It tells the story of a boy called Ke'ai.His parents would like him to become a painter or a _ 0ne day.They teach him to _ and to play the violin,but Ke'ai doesn't enjoy these activities.Then one day Ke'ai's parents see Liu Xiang win a gold _ at the Athens Olympic Games,and they want him to be a sportsman.
"Why do they _ me to be someone else?" Ke'ai asks and says,"I'm Ke'ai,not anybody else. I only want to be _ ."
The play shows us that it is good for parents to learn to _ their children.It helps parents to think about what kids want to do.
Young audience enjoy the story,and also the _ in the play.There are two songs in the play.One of them,"Ke'ai's song" is very _ to 1earn,so the audience can sing the song on their way home after the play!
